attributes.action: Build more cycle lanes on Brent roads
attributes.additional_details: Adding cycle lanes would make people feel more safer riding around the streets of Brent, as it would reduce the risk of serious and/or fatal injury with collisions involving vechiles or other incidents.Futhermore,  this would improve the amount of people riding bikes and therefore help with the weight loss scheme currently put into place.
attributes.background: Add more cycle lanes throughout Brent (and other boroughs if they wish, however our aim is specifically for Brent)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

http://democracy.brent.gov.uk/mgePEtitionLIstDIsplay.aspx?bcr=1&_ga=2.95036888.592144214.1599133052-1601371442.1599133052

You will need to give your full name to start a petition.
